name: Rock Werchter

config_properties.name: Rock Werchter
config_properties.description: Belgium's largest annual rock music festival, held in Werchter since 1974, featuring major international artists.

ai_profile:
**Rock Werchter 2026: A Celebration of Eclectic Sounds**

Rock Werchter 2026 brings together an impressive lineup of 29 artists from around the globe, showcasing a vibrant mix of genres and styles. With a strong focus on rock and its subgenres, the festival highlights Indie Rock (6 artists) and Alternative Rock (5 artists), while also embracing diversity with notable representation from Electronic, Pop, and Soul. This year’s lineup reflects a deliberate effort to blend traditional rock roots with contemporary sounds, offering something for every music lover. 

The festival hosts artists from six countries, with a dominant presence from the USA (12) and the UK (11), alongside acts from Belgium, Canada, Germany, and Australia. While the majority of performers are male (22), the lineup includes representation from female, non-binary, and mixed-gender acts, signaling a step towards inclusivity. However, only two artists identify as people of color, highlighting an area for further growth in future editions. 

With a solid average rating of 7.62 and all acts featured on Spotify, Rock Werchter 2026 promises a high-quality musical experience. Notably, nearly 60% of the rated artists achieved scores above 8, underscoring the festival’s commitment to curating a lineup of exceptional talent. Whether you're a fan of indie, electronic beats, or experimental sounds, this year's festival offers a rich tapestry of music to explore.
